thread.title: General Kelly will decide on Kushner's security clearance: Trump

title: General Kelly will decide on Kushner's security clearance: Trump
text:
General Kelly will decide on Kushner's security clearance: Trump 4:34pm EST - 01:20 
President Donald Trump said on Friday that White House chief of staff John Kelly will decide whether Trump son-in-law and top adviser Jared Kushner gets a security clearance.   
President Donald Trump said on Friday that White House chief of staff John Kelly will decide whether Trump son-in-law and top adviser Jared Kushner gets a security clearance.  //reut.rs/2EMf9T0
